title: Investigate the Selunite Resistance
content:
Investigate the Selunite Resistance Type Quest Act Act 2 Location Last Light Inn Reward Exp

Investigate the Selunite Resistance

Investigate the Selunite Resistance is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Investigate the Selunite Resistance can be acquired during Act 2 and involves exploring several places on the map. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.
